NetSparkleUpdater.​Events.​ItemDownloadProgressEventArgs
ProgressChangedEventArgs
public
NetSparkleUpdater.​Events.​ItemDownloadProgressEventArgs

Provides data for a progress event for downloading an AppCastItem from a web server.

Functions
ItemDownloadProgressEventArgs
public ItemDownloadProgressEventArgs(
int progressPercentage,
object userState
)

Create an ItemDownloadProgressEventArgs object based on the total percentage (0-100, inclusive) and the custom user state.

Parameters
progressPercentage
int

the total download progress as an int (between 0-100)

userState
object

the custom user state sent along with the download progress

ItemDownloadProgressEventArgs
public ItemDownloadProgressEventArgs(
int progressPercentage,
object userState,
long bytesReceived,
long totalBytesToReceive
)

Create an ItemDownloadProgressEventArgs object based on the total percentage (0-100, inclusive), the custom user state, the number of bytes received, and the number of total bytes that need to be downloaded.

Parameters
progressPercentage
int

the total download progress as an int (between 0-100)

userState
object

the custom user state sent along with the download progress

bytesReceived
long

the number of bytes received by the downloader

totalBytesToReceive
long

the total number of bytes that need to be downloadeds

Properties
BytesReceived
public long BytesReceived { get; private set }

The number of bytes received by the downloader

TotalBytesToReceive
public long TotalBytesToReceive { get; private set }

The total number of bytes that need to be downloaded
